headline: Intel, Fedex, Cardlytics, Brera, : Trending Stocks
summary: Intel (INTC) skyrocketed yesterday, closing more than 22% higher after Nvidia (NVDA) announced its $5 billion investment in the company, as part of a push to produce more AI hardware and products in the US. Fedex (FDX) is in focus after reporting results late yesterday that beat analysts’ expectations despite tariff headwinds, and we take a look at a tiny company that has become the market’s latest rocket ship: Brera Holdings (BREA). Plus, Cardlytics (CDLX) soars on hopes that it will benefit from American Express' (AXP) new Platinum cards. For more live coverage of markets watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and head to Yahoo Finance.
